Class: MovableFloatingMode

DrawerJs.plugins. MovableFloatingMode

new MovableFloatingMode(drawer, options)

Allows moving of canvas when it is in 'floating' mode.

removeTool(doDeleteToolbarCreationListeners)

Deletes tool button. If doDeleteToolbarCreationListeners is true - removes listeners of toolbar creation event. So, tool will not appear on toolbar next time, when toolbar is created.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
doDeleteToolbarCreationListeners boolean
